Returns true if the course can be added to the schedule, if not returns false

Checks if the student can add a course to their schedule based on their max credits
canEnroll(Student) - Method in class edu.ncsu.csc216.pack_scheduler.course.roll.CourseRoll
Determines if a student can enroll in a Course
checkConflict(Activity) - Method in class edu.ncsu.csc216.pack_scheduler.course.Activity
Method checks if the current instance of activity conflicts with the passed activity object of the method.
checkConflict(Activity) - Method in interface edu.ncsu.csc216.pack_scheduler.course.Conflict
Accepts an Activity object as a parameter and determines if the object creates a conflict with other activities in the project and if a conflict is created the method throws a ConflictException.
clearData() - Method in class edu.ncsu.csc216.pack_scheduler.manager.RegistrationManager
Clears the data in the course catalog and student directory

compareTo(Student) - Method in class edu.ncsu.csc216.pack_scheduler.user.Student

Conflict - Interface in edu.ncsu.csc216.pack_scheduler.course
The Conflict class is an interface that is used in Activity class.
ConflictException - Exception in edu.ncsu.csc216.pack_scheduler.course
This class is the custom exception class and contains 2 constructors one with a string parameter called message and the other with no parameters.
ConflictException() - Constructor for exception edu.ncsu.csc216.pack_scheduler.course.ConflictException
A parameterless constructor that makes a call to the parameterized constructor passing the default message string.
ConflictException(String) - Constructor for exception edu.ncsu.csc216.pack_scheduler.course.ConflictException
This method takes a String parameter, makes a call to the super class and sets the parameter equal to the default message listed in the project requirements.
Course - Class in edu.ncsu.csc216.pack_scheduler.course
Course class is declared here which contains multiple methods that assist in setting up the Course object.
Course(String, String, String, int, String, int, String) - Constructor for class edu.ncsu.csc216.pack_scheduler.course.Course
Creates a Course with the given name, title, section, credits, instructorID, and meetingDays for courses that are arranged.
Course(String, String, String, int, String, int, String, int, int) - Constructor for class edu.ncsu.csc216.pack_scheduler.course.Course
Constructs a Course object with values for all fields: name, title, section, credits, instructorId, meetingDays, startTime, and endTime for courses that are not arranged.

Abstract inner class for states.
